title: FORICOM Extra Large Hot Water Bag for Pain Relief, Hot Water Bottle for Bed Warming, Dog, Cat,Hot Water Pack, Heat Pack 2Liter
features: [Professional Material] -- This product is made of a thermoplastic material that is both odorless and recyclable. Its advanced design allows it to retain heat for longer periods compared to traditional hot water bottles. In addition, it can also be used as an ice pack or cold water bottle. Please note that this product is not suitable for heating in a microwave oven.

[Safe & Easy to Use] -- This hot water bottle features a wide mouth design that makes it easy and safe to fill and use. It has undergone pressure resistance and leak-proof testing, ensuring its safety for daily use. The product is also odorless and eco-friendly, making it a safe option for pregnant women and children. To use, simply fill with water up to two-thirds capacity and ensure the water temperature is at around 80 degrees Fahrenheit.

[Product Highlights] -- This hot water bottle undergoes thorough leak detection and sealing detection for 24 hours before leaving the factory, ensuring its high quality. Its advanced design allows for extra long heat retention, while the ribbed outer surface helps to maintain temperature and provide a warmer night.

[Helpful Assistant] -- Hot water bottles are versatile tools that can not only provide warmth but also help relieve aches and pains. They are effective in relieving common discomforts such as cold and cough, dysmenorrhea, and other aches. Additionally, they can be used as cold compresses to reduce swelling for minor injuries or to help reduce fever when chilled.

[100% Satisfaction Guarantee] -- We stand behind the quality of our hot water bottle and are confident that you will be satisfied with your purchase. However, if for any reason you are not completely satisfied, you may return the undamaged product and packaging within 30 days, no questions asked. Additionally, we offer a 1-year warranty for any quality issues that may arise. If you encounter any problems, please do not hesitate to contact us via email.
